SPACE WEATHER: (SEE FOM 9.15 SPACE WEATHER FOR MORE INFO) PRODUCT: 3-DAY FORECAST ISSUED: 2025 JAN 01 0030 UTC PREPARED BY THE U.S. DEPT. OF COMMERCE, NOAA, SPACE WEATHER PREDICTION CENTER
C. NOAA RADIO BLACKOUT ACTIVITY AND FORECAST
RADIO BLACKOUTS REACHING THE R1 LEVELS WERE OBSERVED OVER THE PAST 24 HOURS. THE LARGEST WAS AT DEC 31 2024 2250 UTC.
RADIO BLACKOUT FORECAST FOR JAN 01-JAN 03 2025
JAN 01 JAN 02 JAN 03 R1-R2 80% 80% 70% R3 OR GREATER 25% 25% 15%
RATIONALE: M-CLASS FLARES ARE EXPECTED (R1-R2/MINOR-MODERATE), WITH A CHANCE FOR AN ISOLATED X-CLASS FLARES (R3/STRONG) THROUGH 03 JAN, PRIMARILY DUE TO THE FLARE POTENTIAL OF REGION 3936.
---------------------------------------------
FUEL ADDED FOR ALTITUDE FLEXIBLITY & POSSIBLE ENROUTE WX NEAR EBEBE AND BUDRA.
